Class RTSimulatorMath

java.lang.Object
RTSimulator.RTSimulatorMath
public class RTSimulatorMath extends Object
Utility class for performing mathematical operations used in the RTSimulator.
Author:
ShiuJia

    • div

      public static double div(double value1, double value2)
      Divides one double value by another with high precision. The result is rounded to 10 decimal places.
      Parameters:
      value1 - the dividend
      value2 - the divisor
      Returns:
      the result of value1 / value2
